001package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.Comparator;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Optional;
010import java.util.ServiceLoader;
011import java.util.function.Function;
012
013import org.jspecify.annotations.NonNull;
014import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
015
016import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter;
017import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder;
018import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder;
019import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesProvider;
020
021/**
022 * The main entry point into the Ezkv configuration library. This interface provides
023 * access to core components for loading and processing key-value resources.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * {@code KeyValuesSystem} allows the creation and configuration of loaders that can
027 * retrieve key-value pairs from various resources such as files, classpath locations, and
028 * system properties.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Example usage:
032 * {@snippet :
033 * var kvs = KeyValuesSystem.defaults()
034 *      .loader()
035 *      .add("classpath:/start.properties")
036 *      .add("system:///")
037 *      .add("env:///")
038 *      .add("cmd:///-D")
039 *      .load();
040 * }
041 *
042 * @see KeyValuesResource
043 * @see KeyValuesLoader
044 * @see KeyValuesEnvironment
045 * @see KeyValuesServiceProvider
046 */
047public sealed interface KeyValuesSystem extends AutoCloseable {
048
049        /**
050         * Returns the {@link KeyValuesEnvironment} instance used for system-level
051         * interactions.
052         * @return the environment instance
053         */
054        public KeyValuesEnvironment environment();
055
056        /**
057         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} that aggregates all loader
058         * finders added to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if
059         * configured. This composite allows finding loaders that can handle specific
060         * resources by delegating the search to all registered loader finders.
061         * @return the composite loader finder instance
062         */
063        public KeyValuesLoaderFinder loaderFinder();
064
065        /**
066         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} that aggregates all media finders
067         * added to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if configured.
068         * This composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources by
069         * delegating the search to all registered media finders.
070         * @return the composite media finder instance
071         */
072        public KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder();
073
074        /**
075         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesFilter} that aggregates all the filters added
076         * to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if configured. This
077         * composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources byrs.
078         * @return the composite filter
079         */
080        public KeyValuesFilter filter();
081
082        /**
083         * Creates and returns a {@link KeyValuesLoader.Builder} for constructing loaders that
084         * can load key-value pairs from various resources.
085         * @return a new {@link KeyValuesLoader.Builder} instance
086         */
087        default KeyValuesLoader.Builder loader() {
088                Function<KeyValuesLoader.Builder, KeyValuesLoader> loaderFactory = b -> {
089                        var env = environment();
090                        var defaultResource = env.defaultResource();
091                        var variables = Variables.copyOf(b.variables.stream().map(vf -> vf.apply(env)).toList());
092                        var sources = b.sources.stream().map(s -> s.apply(env)).toList();
093                        List<NamedKeyValuesSource> resources = sources.isEmpty() ? List.of(defaultResource) : List.copyOf(sources);
094                        return DefaultKeyValuesSourceLoader.of(this, variables, resources);
095                };
096                return new KeyValuesLoader.Builder(loaderFactory);
097        }
098
099        /**
100         * This signals to the logger that this key value system will not be used anymore but
101         * there is guarantee of this.
102         */
103        @Override
104        default void close() {
105                environment().getLogger().closed(this);
106        }
107
108        /**
109         * Returns a default implementation of {@code KeyValuesSystem} configured with
110         * standard settings and a ServiceLoader based on {@link KeyValuesServiceProvider} and
111         * its classloader. If possible prefer {@link #defaults(String[])} to provide command
112         * line arguments.
113         * @return the default {@code KeyValuesSystem} instance
114         */
115        public static KeyValuesSystem defaults() {
116                return builder().useServiceLoader().build();
117        }
118
119        /**
120         * Returns a default implementation of {@code KeyValuesSystem} configured with
121         * standard settings and a ServiceLoader based on {@link KeyValuesServiceProvider} and
122         * its classloader.
123         * @param mainArgs arguments that come from
124         * <code>public static void main(String [] args)</code>.
125         * @return the default {@code KeyValuesSystem} instance
126         */
127        public static KeyValuesSystem defaults(@NonNull String[] mainArgs) {
128                Objects.requireNonNull(mainArgs);
129                var env = new DefaultKeyValuesEnvironment(mainArgs);
130                return builder().environment(env).useServiceLoader().build();
131        }
132
133        /**
134         * Creates and returns a new {@link Builder} for constructing customized
135         * {@code KeyValuesSystem} instances.
136         * @return a new {@link Builder} instance
137         */
138        public static Builder builder() {
139                return new Builder();
140        }
141
142        /**
143         * A builder class for constructing instances of {@link KeyValuesSystem} with
144         * customizable components such as environment, loaders, and media finders.
145         *
146         * <p>
147         * Note: By default, the {@link ServiceLoader} is not enabled. If you wish to include
148         * services discovered via the {@link ServiceLoader}, you need to explicitly set it
149         * using {@link #serviceLoader(ServiceLoader)}.
150         */
151        public final static class Builder {
152
153                private @Nullable KeyValuesEnvironment environment;
154
155                private List<KeyValuesProvider> providers = new ArrayList<>();
156
157                private List<KeyValuesLoaderFinder> loadFinders = new ArrayList<>(
158                                List.of(DefaultKeyValuesLoaderFinder.values()));
159
160                private List<KeyValuesMediaFinder> mediaFinders = new ArrayList<>(List.of(DefaultKeyValuesMedia.values()));
161
162                private List<KeyValuesFilter> filters = new ArrayList<>(List.of(DefaultKeyValuesFilter.values()));
163
164                private @Nullable ServiceLoader<KeyValuesServiceProvider> serviceLoader;
165
166                private Builder() {
167                }
168
169                /**
170                 * Sets the {@link KeyValuesEnvironment} to be used by the
171                 * {@code KeyValuesSystem}.
172                 * @param environment the environment to set
173                 * @return this builder instance
174                 */
175                public Builder environment(KeyValuesEnvironment environment) {
176                        this.environment = environment;
177                        return this;
178                }
179
180                /**
181                 * Adds a {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} to the list of loader finders.
182                 * @param loadFinder the loader finder to add
183                 * @return this builder instance
184                 */
185                public Builder loadFinder(KeyValuesLoaderFinder loadFinder) {
186                        this.loadFinders.add(loadFinder);
187                        return this;
188                }
189
190                /**
191                 * Adds a {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} to the list of media finders.
192                 * @param mediaFinder the media finder to add
193                 * @return this builder instance
194                 */
195                public Builder mediaFinder(KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder) {
196                        this.mediaFinders.add(mediaFinder);
197                        return this;
198                }
199
200                /**
201                 * Adds a filter to the filter chain.
202                 * @param filter the filter to add
203                 * @return this
204                 * @see KeyValuesFilter
205                 */
206                public Builder filter(KeyValuesFilter filter) {
207                        this.filters.add(filter);
208                        return this;
209                }
210
211                /**
212                 * Adds a provider to provide reference key values. It is recommend that you do
213                 * not use this too much as it would create compile coupling with modules that
214                 * maybe should be runtime scope.
215                 * @param provider provider to add.
216                 * @return this
217                 * @see KeyValuesProvider
218                 */
219                public Builder provider(KeyValuesProvider provider) {
220                        this.providers.add(provider);
221                        return this;
222                }
223
224                /**
225                 * Sets the {@link ServiceLoader} for loading {@link KeyValuesServiceProvider}
226                 * implementations. If this is set, the builder will include any
227                 * {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} and {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} instances found
228                 * via the {@link ServiceLoader}.
229                 *
230                 * <p>
231                 * Note: This is not enabled by default. You must explicitly set a service loader
232                 * to include additional service-provided components.
233                 * @param serviceLoader the service loader to set
234                 * @return this builder instance
235                 */
236                public Builder serviceLoader(ServiceLoader<KeyValuesServiceProvider> serviceLoader) {
237                        this.serviceLoader = serviceLoader;
238                        return this;
239                }
240
241                /**
242                 * Uses the default service loader to load extensions.
243                 * @return this.
244                 */
245                public Builder useServiceLoader() {
246                        return serviceLoader(ServiceLoader.load(KeyValuesServiceProvider.class,
247                                        KeyValuesServiceProvider.class.getClassLoader()));
248                }
249
250                /**
251                 * Builds and returns a new {@link KeyValuesSystem} instance configured with the
252                 * provided settings. The composite loader and media finders will include those
253                 * added through this builder and, if specified, those found via the service
254                 * loader.
255                 * @return a new {@link KeyValuesSystem} instance
256                 */
257                public KeyValuesSystem build() {
258                        var environment = this.environment;
259                        if (environment == null) {
260                                environment = new DefaultKeyValuesEnvironment(null);
261                        }
262                        /*
263                         * We copy as we are about to use the service loader to add more entries and
264                         * to avoid mutable issues.
265                         */
266                        var loadFinders = new ArrayList<>(this.loadFinders);
267                        var mediaFinders = new ArrayList<>(this.mediaFinders);
268                        var filters = new ArrayList<>(this.filters);
269                        var providers = new ArrayList<>(this.providers);
270                        var serviceLoader = this.serviceLoader;
271
272                        if (serviceLoader != null) {
273                                serviceLoader.forEach(s -> {
274                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesLoaderFinder rl) {
275                                                loadFinders.add(rl);
276                                        }
277                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesMediaFinder m) {
278                                                mediaFinders.add(m);
279                                        }
280                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesFilter f) {
281                                                filters.add(f);
282                                        }
283                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesProvider p) {
284                                                providers.add(p);
285                                        }
286                                });
287                        }
288                        Comparator<KeyValuesServiceProvider> cmp = Comparator.comparing(KeyValuesServiceProvider::order);
289                        Collections.sort(loadFinders, cmp);
290                        Collections.sort(mediaFinders, cmp);
291                        Collections.sort(filters, cmp);
292                        Collections.sort(providers, cmp);
293
294                        KeyValuesLoaderFinder loadFinder = (context, resource) -> {
295                                return loadFinders.stream().flatMap(rl -> rl.findLoader(context, resource).stream()).findFirst();
296                        };
297                        KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder = new CompositeMediaFinder(mediaFinders);
298                        KeyValuesFilter filter = new CompositeKeyValuesFilter(filters);
299
300                        var kvs = new DefaultKeyValuesSystem(environment, loadFinder, mediaFinder, filter, providers);
301                        kvs.environment().getLogger().init(kvs);
302                        return kvs;
303                }
304
305        }
306
307}
308
309record CompositeKeyValuesFilter(List<KeyValuesFilter> filters) implements KeyValuesFilter {
310
311        @Override
312        public Optional<KeyValues> filter(FilterContext context, KeyValues keyValues, Filter filter) {
313                boolean found = false;
314                for (var f : filters) {
315                        var opt = f.filter(context, keyValues, filter);
316                        var kvs = opt.orElse(null);
317                        if (kvs != null) {
318                                keyValues = kvs;
319                                found = true;
320                        }
321                }
322                if (found) {
323                        return Optional.of(keyValues);
324                }
325                return Optional.empty();
326        }
327}
328
329/**
330 * A composite media finder that aggregates multiple {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder}
331 * implementations and searches them in sequence for a matching media type.
332 */
333record CompositeMediaFinder(List<KeyValuesMediaFinder> finders) implements KeyValuesMediaFinder {
334        CompositeMediaFinder {
335                finders = List.copyOf(finders);
336        }
337
338        @Override
339        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByExt(String ext) {
340                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByExt(ext).stream()).findFirst();
341        }
342
343        @Override
344        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByMediaType(String mediaType) {
345                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByMediaType(mediaType).stream()).findFirst();
346        }
347
348        @Override
349        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByUri(URI uri) {
350                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByUri(uri).stream()).findFirst();
351        }
352}
353
354/**
355 * A default implementation of {@link KeyValuesSystem}.
356 */
357record DefaultKeyValuesSystem(KeyValuesEnvironment environment, KeyValuesLoaderFinder loaderFinder,
358                KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder, KeyValuesFilter filter,
359                List<KeyValuesProvider> providers) implements KeyValuesSystem {
360
361        DefaultKeyValuesSystem {
362                providers = List.copyOf(providers);
363        }
364}
